attributes.action: Investigate the claim by Steve Baker that an offer of a EU FTA was turned down.
attributes.background: In a Channel 4 interview today 23/05/2019 Steve Baker said that the EU had offered a FTA agreement in March 2019. I would like it be investigated as to why this deal was not taken? As it would have satisfied Leave voters and those that are worried about the economy if we ended up with no deal.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to agree a Free Trade Agreement with the EU if that is something you would like to see happen.
